snippet: The Surflight Theater, which sustained at least $750,000 in damage from Hurricane Sandy, is about to begin its 64th season with shows like “South Pacific” and “Les Miserables.”
abstract: Spotlight column on Surflight Theater in Beach Haven, preparing to roll out its 64th season with shows that lend themselves to escapism, like South Pacific and Les Miserables; 450-seat theater sustained $750,000 in damages from Hurricane Sandy and is eager to reopen (Metropolitan/New Jersey).
lead_paragraph: The Surflight Theater, which sustained at least $750,000 in damage from Hurricane Sandy, is about to begin its 64th season with shows like “South Pacific” and “Les Miserables.”

headline.seo: At the Surflight Theater, a Season Designed to Help Audiences Escape
headline.main: Along With Its Community, a Theater Reboots
headline.print_headline: Along With Its Community, a Theater Reboots
